oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plan of Fort [Brewerton] at the west end of Onnide Lake.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rivez, Charles.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Manuscript maps.; Brun guide.; Gage Maps.; Maps shelf.; Fort Brewerton (N.Y.)--Maps, Manuscript.; Oneida Lake (N.Y.)--Maps, Manuscript.; New York (State)--Maps, Manuscript.; United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps, Manuscript.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Signed: Charles Rivez Fecit.; Shows details of fortifications and vegetation and a profile of the wall and ditch.
